###  Calculated Component

```{r message=FALSE}
library(UltraPseR)
```

```{r}
tiny_sequences <- system.file("extdata", "tiny.fas", package = "UltraPseR")
x <- UpseR(input = tiny_sequences, format = "tsv", module = "comp", note = "stdprot")

```

###  Pse-Protein

```{r }
tiny_sequences <- system.file("extdata", "tiny.fas", package = "UltraPseR")
UpseR(input = tiny_sequences, format = "tsv", note = "stdprot", module = "pse", property = "ZIMJ680105", w = 0.05, l = 10, t = 2)
```

###  Pse-DiDNA

```{r }
DNA_sequences <- system.file("extdata", "tiny-dna.fas", package = "UltraPseR")
UpseR(input = DNA_sequences, format = "tsv", note = "didna", module = "pse", property = "DD0033", w = 0.05, l = 3, t = 1)
```

###  Explore proprety
```{r}
available_prop(note = "didna")
available_prop(note = "stdprot")
```
